page.title: 19LIFE ON A KIDNEY MACHINE
page.content:
My mum had kidney failure in 1975 and for the last ten years has been kept alive with a{kidney machine}and an artificial kidney device.
An artificial kidney filters impurities from her blood and also draws fluid from her blood.
Three times a week she has to insert needles into her veins on her left arm which are then connected by long blood lines to the artificial kidney. For six hours her blood circulates through the artificial kidney via the arterial blood line and is then pumped back into her body via the veins blood line.
Avril Fox aged 14.
